<div align="center">
  <h1 align="center">Studymate</h1>
  <img src="public/icon.svg" alt="Logo" width="100" height="100">
  <p align="center">
   Web-based Study Material Retrieval System <br/>
<a href="https://github.com/sameemul-haque/MiniStudyMate/issues"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/REQUEST%20FEATURES-STUDYMATE-blue?style=for-the-badge"></a>&nbsp;</p>
</div>

---

### Steps

- clone this repo
  ```
  git clone https://github.com/sameemul-haque/MiniStudyMate.git
  ```
- clone this [searchServer](https://github.com/Nuzaim/searchServer)
  ```
  git clone https://github.com/Nuzaim/searchServer.git
  ```
- install npm packages on both programs
  ```
  npm install
  ```
- run npm start on both programs
  ```
  npm start
  ```
  
---
